description.value:
Requirements You are within melee reach of a target, but it is not in combat with you.

While your usual diplomacy is well intentioned, you know that sometimes those same skills will need to be turned to deception. In a flash, you draw a sheathed or concealed agile or finesse weapon and make a melee Strike. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] against your Strike. You then roll Deception for initiative.

source.value: Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires
